participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and passionate about reading and travel, Emily loves exploring new places and diving into different stories.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. i am from a small town. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Friendly and wise, Robert enjoys sharing stories from his travels and has a deep appreciation for literature.
participant_2.background: i am 60 years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today? I am on a farm. I love horses
I'm just reading some old books..are you riding on horse?
no, I just love horses. I am a lawyer. you?
Wow lawyer is a genius profession
oh, I am sorry to hear that. do you have any hobbies?
wow, that is a lot of hobbies. do you have
Actually I like to read books in my leisure besides this I like to travel
that sounds like a fun job. I like horses. do you?
do you like horses? I have a horse. I love them too much
Yes I like horse.. which breed of horse do you have?
I do not have much of a horse. I have a
But you said you have a horse .. what's about the horse
yes, I do. I have a
no, but I do have a family. do you travel? I love it
